MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG4 postcode area of Sanquhar, affecting properties in Craig Drive and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.33am. Our engineers have arrived Kelloholm and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.47am on Thursday 14th January 2021
